problem.p: Which statement is not true about the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architectural pattern?

choice.span: In SaaS apps on the Web, controller actions and view contents are transmitted using HTTP.
All MVC apps have both a “client” part (e.g. Web browser) and a “cloud” part (e.g. Rails app on cloud).
Model-View-Controller is just one of several possible ways to structure a SaaS app.
Peer-to-peer apps can be structured as Model-View-Controller.
